creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
inscription:
-- in graphite on mounting sheet: G224 | 559005
-- in graphite on verso of print: 224
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold October 16, 1991, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Ragman
